Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute at 67th/Blackstone
ShortDescription: 67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, Marquette, Stony Island and 67th: due to, street blockage near 67th/Blackstione.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, Marquette, Stony Island and 67th: due to, street blockage near 67th/Blackstione.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem on a train at UIC-Halsted. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem on a train at UIC-Halsted.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Rosemont
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Rosemont due to a mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Rosemont due to a mechanical problem on a train.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
